definitions.definition: ( transitive , intransitive ) To change to a tan colour due to exposure to the sun.
examples: No matter how long I stay out in the sun, I never tan , though I do burn.

definitions.definition: ( transitive , stative ) To change an animal hide into leather by soaking it in tannic acid . To work as a tanner.
( transitive , informal ) To spank or beat .

main_definition: ( transitive , intransitive ) To change to a tan colour due to exposure to the sun.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , stative ) To change an animal hide into leather by soaking it in tannic acid . To work as a tanner.
( transitive , informal ) To spank or beat .

definitions.definition: To kill by gun , to shoot .

main_definition: ( transitive , MLE , slang ) To kill by gun , to shoot .
